entry.title: Men’s ZinTex Workout Hoodie - Midnight
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Activewear
Price: 65.00

● Made in Los Angeles
● Regular Fit
● Vintage Wash
● Snap Button Hood
● Front Pouch Pocket
● Rimmed Hem & Cuffs
● Heat-Sealed Reflective logos
● + ZinTex Technology

A warm-up essential, the ZinTex Workout Hoodie is made for performance with UV 50+, sweat and odor-proof protection exclusive to ZinTex fabric technology. Designed in a regular fit cut using a cozy vintage wash 100% cotton with heat-sealed reflective logos: featuring “Make the Most of Every Minute” on the hood. Get maximum functionality with heavy-duty snap buttons on the hood and front pouch pocket.

Materials: Body: 100% Cotton | Cuff: 93% Cotton, 7% Spandex
Model Height: 5'11" Size: Medium

entry.title: Men’s ZinTex Slim Fit Joggers - Midnight
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Activewear
Price: 60.00

● Made in Los Angeles
● Classic Tapered Fit
● Drawstring Waistband
● Side Zipper Pocket
● Towel Strap
● Heat-Sealed Reflective Logos
● + ZinTex Technology

The ZinTex Joggers are a classic staple to every workout wardrobe. Made for performance with UV 50+, sweat and odor-proof protection exclusive to ZinTex fabric technology. The adjustable drawstring waistband moves with you as you exercise. Clip your keys, AirPods, or a towel onto your waistband strap for easy access. Designed with heat-sealed reflective logos, four (4) open pockets and one (1) side zipper pocket.

Materials:
Body: 49% Polyester, 46% Cotton, 5% Spandex
Pocket: 92% Polyester, 8% Spandex

﻿﻿Model Height: 5'11" Size: Medium

entry.title: Men’s ZinTex Long Sleeve Sports Tee - Midnight
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Activewear
Price: 42.00

● Made in Los Angeles
● Regular Fit
● Crew Neck
● Raglan Sleeve Cut
● Curved Hemline
● Athletic Mesh Back Panel
● Heat-Sealed Reflective Logos
● + ZinTex Technology

Everything you need for an unmatched workout in one shirt- the ZinTex Long Sleeve Sports Tee. Made for active performance with UV 50+, sweat and odor-proof protection exclusive to antimicrobial ZinTex fabric technology. A cool-to-the-touch classic crew with raglan sleeves made for maximum mobility and comfort as you move. Find an athletic mesh back panel and heat-sealed reflective logos throughout.

Materials:
Body: 90% Polyester, 10% Spandex
Contrast: 92% Polyester, 8% Spandex

﻿﻿Model Height: 5'11" Size: Medium

entry.title: Men’s ZinTex Eco 7" Running Shorts (Concrete)
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Activewear
Price: 54.00

  • Antimicrobial Zinc Oxide
  • 7" Inseam 
  • Zipper Pockets
  • Sweat-Wicking
  • Odor-Repellent
  • Towel Strap

Get ready to take on high-impact workouts in the Zintex Eco Running Shorts. Lightweight and comfortable, these classic-fit shorts feature two pockets and a towel strap. The Zinc Oxide antimicrobial Fabric treatment sanitizes, provides UV protection against harmful sun rays, and blocks odor-causing microbes, keeping you fresh all workout long. Sustainably made using recycled plain weave fabric—all in a silky smooth, breathable design with a reflective logo print.

Materials: 86% Recycled Polyester + 14% Spandex

Model Height: 6'2" Size: Medium

Get ready to take on high-impact workouts in the Zintex Eco Running Shorts with Lining. Lightweight and comfortable, these classic-fit shorts feature a brief lining, towel strap and two pockets to keep everything in place. The Zinc Oxide antimicrobial Fabric treatment sanitizes, provides UV protection against harmful sun rays, and blocks odor-causing microbes, keeping you fresh all workout long. Sustainably made using recycled plain weave fabric—all in a silky smooth, breathable design with a reflective logo print.

Lining: 88% Polyester + 12% Spandex

entry.title: ZinTex Antimicrobial Reusable 3-Ply Sports Mask (Pink)
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Face Mask
Price: 9.00

Features:

  • 3-Ply Fabric
  • Zinc Oxide Protection
  • Droplet Infection Proof
  • 3M Water Repellent
  • Cooling Technology

The ZinTex Antimicrobial Sports Mask is constructed using Zinc Oxide treated fabrics, one of the safest and effective antimicrobial treatments on the market. Shield your face from exterior elements with the two water repellent outer layers made of 100% Polyester. Featuring a cool effect technology which prevents overheating during heavy workouts. The honeycomb interior design is printed using antibacterial paint. Train at ease with the breathable design, pliable nose guard and adjustable straps.

Materials: 100% Polyester exterior & middle layer, 100% Nylon lining.

Care: Machine wash in cold water and air dry.
